    • insertInBookshelf

      public int insertInBookshelf(int column, int currentPlayer)
      Inserts a tile in the bookshelf of the specified player at the given column. It updates the player's score, checks for end game conditions, and returns the player's total score.
      Parameters:
      column - The column in which to insert the tile.
      currentPlayer - The index of the current player.
      Returns:
      The total score of the player after the tile insertion.

    • endGame

      public Map<String,Integer> endGame()
      Ends the game and calculates the final ranking based on the players' total scores. If there is someone managed to fill his bookshelf, the win point is assigned to the winning player. Returns a map representing the ranking with players' names as keys and their total scores as values.
      Returns:
      A map representing the ranking with players' names as keys and their total scores as values.
